titles: D. Bancrofts rashnes in rayling against the Church of Scotland noted in an answere to a letter of a worthy person of England, and some reasons rendred, why the answere thereunto hath not hitherto come foorth. By I.D. a brother of the sayd Church of Scotland.
author: Davidson, John, ca. 1549-1603.
notes: Running title reads: A proofe of D. Bancrofts rashnes against the Church of Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
keywords: Bancroft, Richard, 1544-1610. --  Sermon preached at Paules Crosse the 9. of Februarie --  Early works to 1800.
